acceptance_criteria: A scoped objective statement is recorded in task description
At least one explicit non-goal or constraint is documented in task inputs
tasks.description: Extract concrete target, constraints, and success criteria from request: Подготовить и выполнить исправления критичных рисков в fvg3_long_15m.py: детерминирован...
tasks.title: Clarify scope and constraints

acceptance_criteria: Dependency edges are acyclic and every dependency references a valid task id
tasks.description: Translate scoped objective into actionable steps, owners, and dependency order.
tasks.title: Prepare execution plan and work breakdown

acceptance_criteria: Each task has 2-4 measurable acceptance criteria
Validation report states pass/fail for dependency and DoD quality checks
tasks.description: Check all tasks for measurable DoD and graph-contract compliance before execution.
tasks.title: Validate planned tasks and Definition of Done

acceptance_criteria: A plain-language summary is attached to plan output
Each task title has a one-sentence explanation understandable by non-developers
tasks.description: Capture assumptions, links, and completion criteria for non-technical handoff.
tasks.title: Document plan decisions and handoff details

acceptance_criteria: Applied TG tasks include origin_plan_id and created_by metadata
TG index rebuild verification returns pass status
tasks.description: Optionally append planned tasks to TG with idempotency and index verification.
tasks.title: Apply approved task plan to Task Graph
